data.name: Dark Old Sun II: Unspace
data.detailed_description:
As the Dark Old Sun dies, everyone in earth wither along and a calamity called UNSPACE begins, trapping everyone in earth proximity, preventing anyone to return if they ever leave. The unspace bends reality in strange ways and almost impossible to return from it.

The last bastion of humanity, the YAMATO, is a space station that can deploy spaceships that can explore and safely return from inside the UNSPACE.
GRID, an AI programmer and hacker, seems to be the only one still capable of piloting the Crow, the spaceship that can resonate with YAMATO and find its way back to it, even from inside the UNSPACE, wants to create a passageway outside the UNSPACE, leading humanity to a new home.




An shoot'em up game with RPG elements and a little bit of roguelite mechanics too.
You can use the spaceship cockpit to navigate and experience awesome cool synthwave music tracks, customize your own little navigator the Dolli, and build new upgrades to YAMATO, expanding it and making new facilities to intereact, like market and workshop where you can buy new weapons and modify them.

You can explore randomized maps and fight hand made waves of enemies with interesting random mixes that make each battle unique.
Get new weapons in a diablo-like drop mechanic, where you always find new and different weapons that can actually change its own mechanics, you will never get the same weapon twice.

Everything you get is persistent, this is not a roguelike game, so you never lose your equipment and level.




  • - More than 50 base equipments, that get randomized modifications making infinite possibilities
  • - Randomized maps that changes everytime you enter
  • - Little navigator Dolli, where you can change its clothes and hair ðŸ¤©
  • - Workshop system where you can change weapons behaviours, level and masteries
  • - Space station where you can build upgrades and new sections, expanding it creating new interactive features.
  • - Interactive cockpit where you can chill whatching the beautful deep space around you listening to synthwave music
  • - Also... Amazing synthwave music selection ðŸŽ¶
  • - Diverse and machanic-rich enemies that dont just "come-shoot-leave", they have thoughtful abilties

data.short_description: A calamity that imprisons everyone in a dying earth, the unspace. Explore the uncharted space in random generated maps, get new weapons in a diablo-like weapon drop system and upgrade them, level up, and also chilling inside your spaceship listening to amazing synthwave tracks. Conquer the unknow.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
